text:
`upload` by default Does auto-deploy, but this can be switched off in favor of deploying specific deploys with `deploy`! `deploy` can also be used to rollback a change.
People use many different techniques for managing environments, definitely still WIP. You can use multiple apps so that each app is the "feature", "beta", or "release" (or whatever else) version you desire for dev!

I've requested Beta for CRM UI Public, but not yet approved.
Who can help me?

<@U07SSE538J2> as mentioned above, there are a <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/crm/ui-extensions/sdk#upload-files|couple workarounds to upload a file>. If none of these work, could you tell me more about:

• Do you want files to be stored in HubSpot at all? Or on your own system?
• How do your customers want to interact with the file in HubSpot? Do they want to view it within HubSpot File Manager at all?
